originalText.text: Dr.Levy what a Amazing Podiatrist you are! You and your staff were , kind, caring, courteous! You went over all my concerns,  needs, and helped with a solution. It was my first visit and I felt like I knew you all years! Thank you emensley for caring for your patients the way ya'll do, I say this because I saw first hand they didn't just treat me like this they were like this with all the patients giving their time equally. I will definitely recommend to family ,friends and friends of friends & Family. If you want to go somewhere and know you are in good hands I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND Starrett Podiatry! üôåüôèüèæ I AM DIABETIC AND HAD SOMETHING IN MY FOOT, DR.LEVY AFTER GOING TO OTHER PLACES HE WAS FINALLY ABLE TO RELIEVE THE PAIN IN MY FOOT AND REMOVE WHAT WAS IN MY FOOT. ASIDE FROM MY HEEL SPUR I AM NO LONGER IN PAIN WITH SOMETHING IN MY FOOT. THANK YOU FOR LISTENING TO ME, FOR YOUR PATIENCE AND KINDNESS! IT DID NOT GO UNNOTICEDüòä

originalText.text: Dr. was very informative and patient with my husband. She even allowed me his spouse to come into the room to ease his fears, and she was very gentle with him. After seeing how through and efficient she was, I made me an appointment, and her staff was extremely helpful and nice. we love the Lexington office dr and staff.

originalText.text: My podiatrist was Dr Krish! She was really nice and sweet. She explained everything to me so well due to my condition. The staff member that was there who did my x-rays was amazing as well! The appointment was fast and not a long wait. I can‚Äôt wait for her to heal my foot moving forward.

originalText.text: Dr. Krish is a very attentive Dr. Listens to your concerns and offers multiple courses of treatment. Very easy to schedule and little to no wait time to see her. Highly recommend Dr. Krish!

originalText.text: Brian levy is a friendly, knowledgeable doctor but the rest of the stuff is very unprofessional and non transparent. Most of the population of patients seem older and may have the time to wait all day or keep going in for calls back from the office.
